text: Samarai-Murua District is a district of the Milne Bay Province of Papua New Guinea. Its capital is Murua. The population of the district was 58,590 at the 2011 census.Districts of Papua New Guinea at statoids.com The district derives its name from the islands of Samarai and Woodlark Island, the latter also being called Murua. ==References== Category:Districts of Papua New Guinea Category:Milne Bay Province
title: Samarai-Murua District
